Text:
Well thanks for this but i have requested voice changing software during call,i wanna change my voice during call and play pranks with friends. I have used these software in demo but they are not for calling they Are just voice recorder
And i hope voice changing is possible in Android world correct me if i m wrong

@viraj3

For changing your voice in a call the only program that do that in android is this:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.weirdvoice&hl=el

I dont know if there is any other apllication that do the same thing
This app uses wifi for calling doesn't use our cellular network service to call which for me is of no use, kind of crap
